V2.0.0.description:
- merged all huniepop 1 projects into one Git repository - (apworld/client)added option/logic to randomise gifts - (apworld/client)added option/logic to randomise like/disliked puzzle icons - (apworld)changed some location names for better understanding - (apworld)added archipelago.json to APWorld for archipelago 0.7.0 compatibility - (client)made shop prioritize gifts that are needed for unlocked girls - (client)made shop show if a gift is currently required for current girl(heart) or other unlocked girls(star) - (client)added 4 save slots

CLIENT INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: - Have Hunie Pop Installed - Download Hunie Pop Archipelago plugin (See Releases for latest version) - Extract and copy the contents of "Hunie Pop Archipelago plugin.zip" to the directory where "HuniePop.exe" is if it asks you to overwrite files click yes - NOTE if you get a game crash when starting the game make sure that in "{huniepop game directory}/BepInEx/config/BepInEx.cfg" the 2nd last option is "type = MonoBehaviour" not "type = Application" APWORLD INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: - Have Archipelago Launcher Installed (latest release found here: https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases/latest ) - Download Huniepop APWorld (See Releases for latest version) - Select "Install APWorld" in launcher and select Huniepop APWorld you downloaded - Restart launcher for APWorld to properly install - (Optional but Recomended)Select "Generate Template Options" to generate default Huniepop YMAL POPTRACKER INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: - copy "Hunie Pop Archipelago poptracker.zip" to your poptracker "packs" folder
V2.0.0.title: Hunie Pop Archipelago V2.0.0

V2.1.0.description:
- (APWorld) Added option for setting cost of date gifts in store - (Client) Changed gift store tab to populate with date gifts - (Client) Changed unique store tab to populate with girl gifts and arch items - (Client) Changed start up message in console to include information about F8 to open/close console - (Client) Changed Item processing message for gifts to be in one line

CLIENT INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: - Have Hunie Pop Installed - Download Hunie Pop Archipelago plugin (See Releases for latest version) - Extract and copy the contents of "Hunie Pop Archipelago plugin.zip" to the directory where "HuniePop.exe" is if it asks you to overwrite files click yes - NOTE if you get a game crash when starting the game make sure that in "{huniepop game directory}/BepInEx/config/BepInEx.cfg" the 2nd last option is "type = MonoBehaviour" not "type = Application" APWORLD INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: - Have Archipelago Launcher Installed (latest release found here: https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases/latest ) - Download Huniepop APWorld (See Releases for latest version) - Select "Install APWorld" in launcher and select Huniepop APWorld you downloaded - Restart launcher for APWorld to properly install - (Optional but Recomended)Select "Generate Template Options" to generate default Huniepop YMAL
V2.1.0.title: Hunie Pop Archipelago V2.1.0

V2.1.1.description:
- (Repo) added info in README.md for using "ws://" or "wss://" if getting SSL error - (Client) Fixed luck upgrades not being processed properly V2.1.0 changelog - (APWorld) Added option for setting cost of date gifts in store - (Client) Changed gift store tab to populate with date gifts - (Client) Changed unique store tab to populate with girl gifts and arch items - (Client) Changed start up message in console to include information about F8 to open/close console - (Client) Changed Item processing message for gifts to be in one line

V2.1.1.title: Hunie Pop Archipelago V2.1.1

V2.1.2.description:
- (Client) Fix error when processing "nothing" items causing it to skip other items that need to be processed V2.1.1 changelog - (Repo) added info in README.md for using "ws://" or "wss://" if getting SSL error - (Client) Fixed luck upgrades not being processed properly V2.1.0 changelog - (APWorld) Added option for setting cost of date gifts in store - (Client) Changed gift store tab to populate with date gifts - (Client) Changed unique store tab to populate with girl gifts and arch items - (Client) Changed start up message in console to include information about F8 to open/close console - (Client) Changed Item processing message for gifts to be in one line
